title: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The bug report does not provide the observed behavior.
EB: The BidiUtil class in win32 should have a private constructor. Since there are no nonstatic methods in this class, it is unnecessary to allow instantiation of the class. The constructor should be made private to prevent it from being accessed from outside the class.
SR:
1. Open the BidiUtil class in the win32 project.
2. Remove the existing constructor.
3. Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class.
4. Verify that the BidiUtil class cannot be instantiated from outside the class.
